name: Chronicles of a Dark Lord: Episode II War of The Abyss
description: Experience the 30+ hour long continuation of the saga of the Dark Lord, Magus Drakhen Lee, in this innovative next installment that will draw you into the world of Cora like never before...
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Intel 1.8 Ghz or AMD 2.0 Ghz Graphics: DirectX Accelerated Video Card with 512 MB RAM and Shader Model 2 support DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 6 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed the game play and story.
my computer is sick use not good, begin new game have a problem. I am sad.
